content: the tranquility blanket strip is the first part of the harmony ** throw blanket pattern crochet along 1 ** this free crochet along blanket pattern is made out of 12 different stripes that are worked on top of each other no joining here and are separated by 2 transition row each strip of the blanket was designed by a different designer the crochet along is hosted from 10/17-11/28 1 https //madebygootie com/crochet/modern-crochet-blanket-pattern/
